contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Greek Dimos |name = Velo |name_local = Βέλο |image_map = Dimos Velou.png |map_caption = Location within the regional unit |periph = [[Peloponnese (region)|Peloponnese]] |periphunit = [[Corinthia]] |municipality = [[Velo-Vocha]] |pop_municunit = 8211 |population_as_of = 2001 |population_ref = [http://www.statistics.gr/gr_tables/S1101_SAP_1_TB_DC_01_03_Y.pdf source] |area_municunit = 77.0 |elevation = 20 |lat_deg = 37 |lat_min = 58 |lat_hem = N |lon_deg = 22 |lon_min = 47 |lon_hem = E |postal_code = 200 02 |area_code = 27420 |licence = ΚΡ |mayor = |website = |image_skyline = |caption_skyline = |city_flag = |city_seal = |districts = |party = |since = |elevation_min = |elevation_max = }} '''Velo''' ([[Greek language|Greek]]: Βέλο, [[Katharevousa]]: Βέλον) is a town and a former municipality in [[Corinthia]], [[Peloponnese (region)|Peloponnese]], [[Greece]]. Since the 2011 local government reform it is part of the municipality [[Velo-Vocha]], of which it is a municipal unit.<ref name=Kallikratis>[http://www.kedke.gr/uploads2010/FEKB129211082010_kallikratis.pdf Kallikratis law] Greece Ministry of Interior {{el icon}}</ref> It is located about 15 km west from [[Corinth]], and 5 km southeast of [[Kiato]]. [[Greek National Road 8]], the old [[Corinth]]-[[Patras]] highway, passes through the town. ==Subdivisions== The municipal unit Velo is subdivided into the following communities (constituent villages in brackets): * Velo (Velo, Sataiika) * [[Ellinochori, Corinthia|Ellinochori]] * [[Kokkoni]] * [[Krines]] * [[Nerantza]] * [[Poulitsa]] * [[Stimagka]] * [[Tarsina, Corinthia|Tarsina]] ==Historical population== {| class=wikitable ! Year !! Town population !! Municipality population |- | 1981 || 949 || - |- | 1991 || 1,086 || 8,200 |- | 2001 || 3,041 || 8,211 |} ==Other== The community has an elementary school, a secondary school, churches, a post office, a train station (no longer operational), banks, beaches,hotels, a semi-professional soccer team named Ellàs Vèlou and a square (''[[plateia]]'') called 'Liberty square' with greenery. The entire area is covered with arable land containing fruit and olive groves, pastures and mixed farming while hills dominate the southern part of the municipality, also consisting of groves and forested areas. The Corinth-Patra toll booth for [[Greek National Road 8A|Greece National Road 8A]] is found southeast of Velo. Regarding [[seismology]], the region's closest fault line is east of the area ([[Corinth Fault]]). == Notable people == *[[Stathis Psaltis]] (1952) actor *Alexis Kougias, lawyer *Tryfon Papoutsis, actor ==References== <references/> ==External links== *[http://www.gtp.gr/LocPage.asp?id=9408 GTP - Velo] *[http://www.gtp.gr/LocPage.asp?id=9407 GTP - Municipality of Velo] *[http://www.pelopas.webs.com Our Homeland ( www.pelopas.webs.com)] ==See also== *[[List of settlements in Corinthia]] {{Geographic location |Centre = Velo |North = |Northeast = ''[[Gulf of Corinth]]'' |East = |Southeast = [[Vocha]] |South = |Southwest = [[Nemea (town)|Nemea]] |West = |Northwest = [[Sikyona]] }} {{Velo-Vocha div}} [[Category:Populated places in Corinthia]]
